Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black with two added white bands; exterior: painted decoration consisting of lion or sphinx (one foreleg remaining) to left; part of elaborate rosette as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0963) (phase 2)
